articles.title: Nvidia Promises Never-Before-Heard Sounds With Its New AI Audio Generator - Gizmodo
articles.description: Nvidia’s Fugatto is designed for ‘film or audio productions,’ but it can also create the sound of a saxophone howling like a dog.
articles.content: Nvidia wants to let you know that your weirdest audio whims are now possible. The companys latest AI project, along with its AI NPCs and in-game chatbot, is a text-to-audio AI called Fugatto. Like ot… [+3362 chars]
